translations: vt.危及（等于 jeopardize）；使……受危险

sentences.sentence: The consequences of our water policies extend beyond jeopardising human health.
sentences.translation: 我们用水政策的后果不仅仅是危害人类健康。

sentences.sentence: This also means that people taking anti-depressants may be jeopardising their ability to fall in love.
sentences.translation: 这也意味着服用抗抑郁药物的人们可能正在危及他们彼此相爱能力。

sentences.sentence: I beg you not to do this: you would be jeopardising your cheap lodgings and will make her doubly dislike you.
sentences.translation: 我劝你别这样做：否则你可能会失去廉价住所，还会让她加倍地讨厌你。
